definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: propagate, increase (si vera l.) ( > denom. fr. [[נין]] Hup-Now SS;—NH [[נוּן]] = fish, so Aram. [[נוּנׇא]], nos, As. nunu;—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: [[ינּוֹן]] Qr Ps 72:17 let his name have increase (or, if Niph., be propagated, spread); but dub., Vrss perh. [[יִכּוֹן]] be established, endure.
